import React from 'react' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import { Divider, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import Paper from '@material-ui/core/Paper'; import img from './about.jpg' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { flexGrow: 1, marginTop:"3rem", marginBottom:"3rem" }, grid:{ paddingTop:"3rem", paddingBottom:"3rem" }, paper:{ background:"transparent", width:"80%" } })) const Aboutus = () => { const classes=useStyles() return ( <>
ABOUT US
Sunset Lodge Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Animi natus quasi quam alias quos libero cumque! Quia modi quibusdam
voluptates neque optio molestiae commodi, distinctio iure! Quod hic delectus accusamus.
) } export default Aboutus
